name: Cherubimon_(Evil)_X
description: Cherubimon (Evil) X is a Cherub Digimon and carrier of the X-Antibody . Endless dark energy has accumulated in its abdomen, and it has learned the art of manipulating darkness. Having been banished from its position as one of the Celestial Digimon , it is filled with envy from losing the ultimate "Virtue" and hatred towards the world for causing its fall to this state.
